revised_title: Inositol Lipids and Transmembrane Signaling: Nomenclature and Abbreviations
tldr: This article discusses the nomenclature and abbreviations of inositol lipids and their role in transmembrane signaling. The authors propose using simpler and more easily spoken alternatives for the IUB/IUPAC-recommended abbreviations. They also address the challenges in naming and abbreviating phospholipase C enzymes and G-proteins, highlighting the need for a standardized system.
